lenders.name: Sarah Marie
lenders.loan_because: SARAH MARIE Stationery & Wrap began with a love of paper, and a desire to make a difference in the world. Working as an interior designer in Manhattan, Sarah found she needed a creative outlet beyond high rise buildings. She dreamed of a job that combined her passion for design with her passion for social change. She created this dream job for herself with SARAH MARIE Stationery & Wrap. We use our passion to fuel the passions of others; we support entrepreneurs and artisans worldwide with our profits, and we’re a paper company whose success gives back to the environment instead of hurting it.  We also believe in the power of entrepreneurship and the ability of micro loans to effectively deliver needed funds to entrepreneurs and artisans all over the world. This is why we have also committed to donate 5% of our overall profits to Kiva.org.  As our loans are paid back, we re-loan the money to new entrepreneurs, so the number of people we are able to help grows exponentially with each new year.
